SEARCH
Package io.github.jy95.fds.common.types

Interface FDSOperations<Q,C,E,D,R,T>

Type Parameters:
Q - The type representing Quantity in the FHIR version.
C - The type representing CodeableConcept in the FHIR version.
E - The type representing Extension in the FHIR version.
D - The type representing Dosage in the FHIR version.
R - The type representing DoseAndRateComponent in the FHIR version.
T - The type representing a FHIR Type (Quantity, Duration, ...).
public interface FDSOperations<Q,C,E,D,R,T>
A version-independent interface for FHIR operations. Subclasses must implement methods for specific FHIR versions.
Author:
jy95

    Description

    fromCodeableConceptToString(C codeableConcept)
    Converts a FHIR CodeableConcept to a string representation.

    Converts a list of FHIR Extension objects to a JSON-like string representation.

    Converts a FHIR Quantity object to a string representation of its unit or code.

  • Method Details

    • fromFHIRQuantityUnitToString

      CompletableFuture<String> fromFHIRQuantityUnitToString(Q quantity)
      Converts a FHIR Quantity object to a string representation of its unit or code.
      Parameters:
      quantity - the Quantity object to be converted.
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture that resolves to the unit or code of the Quantity

    • fromCodeableConceptToString

      CompletableFuture<String> fromCodeableConceptToString(C codeableConcept)
      Converts a FHIR CodeableConcept to a string representation.
      Parameters:
      codeableConcept - the CodeableConcept to be converted.
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture that resolves to the text, display, or code of the first coding

    • fromExtensionsToString

      CompletableFuture<String> fromExtensionsToString(List<E> extensions)
      Converts a list of FHIR Extension objects to a JSON-like string representation.
      Parameters:
      extensions - the list of Extension objects to be converted.
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture that resolves to a JSON-like string representing the extensions.

    • selectDosageAndRateField

      T selectDosageAndRateField(List<R> doseAndRateComponentList, DoseAndRateKey doseAndRateKey)
      Selects a specific dosage and rate field from a list of Dosage.DosageDoseAndRateComponent.
      Parameters:
      doseAndRateComponentList - the list of dosage components.
      doseAndRateKey - the key used to extract the specific field.
      Returns:
      the extracted Type value.

    • hasMatchingComponent

      boolean hasMatchingComponent(D dosage, Predicate<R> predicate)
      Checks if a Dosage has any component matching a given predicate.
      Parameters:
      dosage - the Dosage to check
      predicate - the predicate to apply to each component.
      Returns:
      true if any component matches the predicate; false otherwise.
